name: Dunya Rahim
about:
I’m an Information Science student at the University of Maryland who enjoys JS and data.

Currently building small tools and learning product thinking.

projects.name: Pinterest Engagement CLI
projects.description: Analyzes engagement trends (likes, comments) from CSV using SQLite and Matplotlib.

projects.name: TaskTrackr (CLI)
projects.description: Command-line to-do tracker with priorities and due dates using argparse and JSON; includes unit tests.

projects.name: Montgomery County Crime SQL Analysis
projects.description: SQL analysis of 300k+ records to find trends by ZIP, agency, and crime type; led ERD design and normalization.

projects.name: 5-Day Weather Forecast CLI
projects.description: API-based CLI that fetches and prints a five-day forecast using OpenWeatherMap.

experience.summary: Built responsive web interfaces and integrated APIs; provided technical support and basic troubleshooting; collaborated with backend developers and contributed to process efficiency.
Conducted research on digital collections focused on metadata standards and digital preservation; performed data analysis to evaluate archival methods.
Troubleshot hardware and software issues; supported IT systems management; improved user experience.
